post.body: Lemy from Motorhead would say you're saving your money for a fraud.
*IF* you wanted to go? You mean you're not? Why waste my money, then?
hahahahhaahah
You're not kidding, love. My car hates me. That said, I'll be taking it to visit you in Philly soon.
"Gurjburger: Made with 100% douche!"
What for? She's not as funny. Then again, maybe she is...
Know any Punjabi girls to set up my tow truck driver with? He's really nice, except for his excessive spitting.
is that a good yeaaaaaaaaa or a bad yeaaaaaaaaa?
I do. Oh, wait... I'm in NYC. Never mind.
"Month Without Frat Boy Douchebags" may already be hapening. It's called "layoffs at investment banks".
@lisagraham138 It's true. Saw it at the Buffalo Tom show.
That was great.
No. We haven't been in the same room in two weeks, I don't think.
Too late! I had my phone off :(
The one where a WSN reporter writes a story that Jerry and George are gay lovers. Not that there's anything wrong with that.
Hang the DJ.
Congrats! Maybe you won't be a stranger now...
You're f'ing Jabba The Hutt? Is that nice to call that person?
This game just got fun.
Hey hey whaddya say? Had me a woman, she flew away.
What is this "Palestine" place you speak of? I looked on a map and don't see it. Oh, wait, here it is. "Palestine, TX".
I've got your back. Where are you?
Are you djing tonight?
Thanks for the compliment, though two months off my bike hasn't helped. And you know how dull I can be. I'm at a hedge fund.
Any offer like that from me is most certainly ugly. Also, I work nights since it's the only way I can earn the money you so covet.
Don't worry. So is my offer.
Do you mind being a kept woman, then?
That's the part I can't believe!
Why was I not informed today was bike weather? Wouldn't have partied hard, Andrew WK-style.
Debating whether I want to spend $50 to see "Valkyrie" with Tom Cruise doing a Q&A after. To @krucoff: C'mon, I don't want to pay retail.
Oh nos! Flat tire!
If I go to Sam's party, I'll be about twice the age of everyone there. That's okay, though, 'cause it's legal now.
Gawker commenters perving on cousin Nicola today as if @Bronques wrote each one: http://tinyurl.com/556egy
Why are gays silent about this new Che Guevara movie? Che imprisoned gays just for being gay. Is it only 'cause he looked good on t-shirts?
Screaming at Bank of America has been a monthly occurrence since May. You'd figure I'd learn by now but you'd be figuring wrong.
I've set it up so that whenever my bank account goes below a certain amount, my bank emails me, "Stop spending money. You're almost poor."
Now following @LOLhan and so should you, too. KTHANXBAI.
Car brokedown on corner of Bushwick and Metropolitan. Gas station dude particularly unhelpful. Getting towed to Manhattan.
Also, hearing any version of "Trois Nuits Par Semaine" on FOX-5 made me spit up my tea on my shirt. My teenaged self just freaked out.
Ad for new Jean-Paul Gaultier perfume ad is with a cover version of Indochine's "Trois Nuits Par Semaine"! Also has Agynes Deyn in it. Whoa!
Dena's posts on PopSerious.com are consistently the funniest pop culture critiques on the Internet, bar none. There. I said it.
Who knows anything about opening up a bank account in Ireland? DM me back. Thanks!
What do you want from me? "You're built like a coxswain" is too a compliment.
Good. The military analyst geek beat the arrogant douchebag on Stylista. I hope to Allah there won't be another season of this garbage.
Okay, which one of you gave me a cold? I had a flu shot. This isn't supposed to happen. Someone's gotta take the blame.
Standing next to a cross between Andrew Lloys Webber and @Lock at McCormick and Schmick's.
Just saw an owl kill and eat a pidgeon in front of my door. Not cool, nature.
Obama looked like a character from the movie "Fame" in this 1980 photoshoot: http://tinyurl.com/TimeObam1980
Watching the "Seinfeld" where they goof on The Washington Square News.
At Balthazar's real bakery in Englewood. It's ginormous and I never want to leave.potbelly
"Coffin Turbo Pump, Inc." sounds like the name of a crappy high school goth band but it's a real company in beautiful Englewood, NJ.
Discovered that no good deed goes unpunished as is never taking tourists around NYC ever again.
Israel's consulate general to the UN is named Reda Mansour. The Palestinians rep to the UN is Riyad Mansour. Think they're related?
Finding it funny how the PLO is totally for the Israeli invasion of Gaza but they can't say it publicly 'cause, well, they're the PLO.
Will people give me shit for wearing my "Gaza Strip Club" tee-shirt out tonight?
Jami Gertz's bad acting really ruins "Less Than Zero". She also ruins baseball by being an owner in the Milwaukee Brewers.
Watching "Less Than Zero", getting nostalgic remembering being around that age at that time.
At the Empire State Building with the Swedes. We haven't gone to sleep yet.
I can't believe I'm at work right now.
Watching marathon of the best show ever: "American Greed" on CNBC. Madoff investors shouldn't have been surprised by anything.
